title: Ending hunger now
description: Josette Sheeran, the head of the UN's World Food Program, talks about why, in a world with enough food for everyone, people still go hungry, still die of starvation, still use food as a weapon of war. Her vision: "Food is one issue that cannot be solved person by person. We have to stand together."
author: Josette Sheeran
keywords: TED, talks, culture, economics, food, global issues, peace, politics, war
